file_content.text: It would be unwise to make the situation on Denova common knowledge. Moff Altiss appreciates your discretion.
The Emperor's Wrath! Forgive my surprise, my lord, but your reputation precedes you. It is a stroke of great fortune for my master that you are here.
Greetings, my lord. Please forgive a humble droid for approaching a member of the Dark Council, but my master is in great need.
Data files confirm you are the Grand Champion of the Great Hunt. My master would be very interested to meet the galaxy's premier bounty hunter.
There are whispers that you were once a key operative with Imperial Intelligence. My master has urgent need of someone with your skills.
I extend this offer to all of you, as my master may require the combined efforts of several talented individuals.
Forgive my impertinence, but my master is in urgent need.
I represent Moff Altiss. She has instructed me to seek out those capable of fixing a critical mission on Denova that has gone awry.
Help her? Your master must face the consequences of her own weakness.
Failure should be punished.
I am a member of the Dark Council; it is not my responsibility to clean up after some incompetent Moff.
Why should I fix her mistake?
Moff Altiss is not to blame for what transpired. She is merely attempting to salvage something from this disaster.
Why do you always wait until something goes wrong to bring me in? Probably cheaper just to hire me up front.
You people need my help a lot.
It does seem inefficient. But Moff Altiss is not to blame for this disaster. She is only tasked with salvaging something from the situation.
It wouldn't be the first time I cleaned up someone else's mess.
Fixing mistakes is what I do.
To be clear, Moff Altiss is not responsible for this disaster. She is merely trying to salvage something from the wreckage.
Failure to do so would seriously weaken the Empire's position, leaving us vulnerable to our sworn enemies in the Republic.
Is that a Republic world, or one of ours?
I'm not familiar with Denova.
Is that a Republic world, or one of yours?
Denova? Never heard of it.
The world was only recently discovered. Military forces claimed it for the Empire. The Republic responded with an army of mercenaries.
The outcome of the battle will have far-reaching effects for both sides. We cannot afford to lose.
Just tell me what I need to do.
I'm ready to help.
I am not authorized to discuss any of the details. I can only say that Moff Altiss is eager to meet with you face-to-face.
It is a great honor for a lowly protocol droid to share the presence of such powerful and important individuals.
